# Minor Update Pull Request

This template is intended for **small or incremental changes** (minor fixes, small improvements, quick refactors).

## Description
Provide a brief summary of the change.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Small bug fix
- [ ] Minor feature improvement
- [ ] Small refactor
- [ ] Documentation tweak

## How Has This Been Tested?
Briefly describe the tests or manual checks performed.

## Checklist
- [ ] The change is minimal and does not affect core logic
- [ ] I tested the updated code
- [ ] Documentation updated if necessary
- [ ] Code follows the projectâ€™s style guidelines
